Comment 1: 
Four workarounds:

hg sync --local (automatically removes unmodified files from CLs)
hg sync (same but does a real sync too)
hg change N (lets you edit them away)
hg change -o N |grep -v filename | hg change -i N  (for scripts)

I looked at fixing the actual bug and it appears that
Mercurial refuses to give me the information I need.
So I am not planning to fix this; sorry.  I think it's 
Mercurial's fault.
